thread.title: Gracious, historically important hotel in an excellent location
thread.title_full: Gracious, historically important hotel in an excellent location - Review of Hotel des Saints-Peres - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: roberttX3184BL
title: Gracious, historically important hotel in an excellent location
text: Lovely calm hotel with gracious and well-trained staff. The rooms are ample and well appointed, in a classic French style. The breakfast buffet is excellent, including delicious genuine croissant as well as American breakfast fare. It is off the beaten path, but in an great location on the Left Bank.
